name: Chocolate Eclair Cake
author: Pat Schlosser Jenkins

ingredients.name: pkg. (34 oz.) instant French vanilla pudding mix

instructions: Place a single layer of whole graham crackers on the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine pudding mix with 3 cups of the milk, sit- ting until thickened. Fold in whipped topping. Spread half the pud- ding on graham cracker layer. Add another layer of crackers. Cover with remaining pudding. Top with third layer of crackers. In a small saucepan, combine remaining ingredients. Stir over low heat just until liquified. Pour over top layer of crackers. Refrigerate at least 28 hours. May prepare two days before serving.
